Burger bụ aha nna sina West German
Burger bụ okwu Dutch na Afrikaans maka 'onye nweere onwe ya' ma ọ bụ 'nwa amaala' (German Bürger, Low German Börger) na aha nna ya bụ aha nna Bekee Burgess
Na mba ndị na-asụ Dutch na German ọ nwere ike ịbụ aha nna, na-egosi mmalite site na nke ọ bụla n'ime ọtụtụ obodo na-agwụ na -burg
Ndị ama ama naza aha nna gụnyere:
